dotnetType.name: DecimalResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.DecimalResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.Decimal" />;
            an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DecimalResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
